data.title: Request for Participation: Market Research Questionnaire
data.excerpt: DCC is undertaking comprehensive market research to evaluate suitable software solutions for a Cannabis Licensing and Compliance system. Your expertise and insights are invaluable to informing our decision-making process as we progress through our reportable project planning efforts.

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
